page.title: 18GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: On the playground games are mostly skipping, ball and clapping games with rhymes, group games are usually versions of tig or football. Skipping rhyme; Bumble bee,bumble bee, Chase me round the apple tree. During the chanting of the second line the first child runs out followed in line by the rest until someone breaks the skipping rhythm. Ball game rhyme , Im a little girl guide dressed in blue, These are the actions I must do, Salute to the officer, Curtsy to the Queen, Turn around like a washing machine. Children perform actions with each line.The 1920 version ended_Turn your back on Kaiser Bill.At home children played computer and video games.
